languages.text: "Что бы не происходило, ты всегда был рядом, Абеляр".
"Abelard, no matter what happened, you were always at my side."
languages.original_text: "Что бы не происходило, ты всегда был рядом, Абеляр".

traits.locale_text: "Abelard, no matter what happened, you were always at my side."
"Abelard, no matter what happened, you were always at my side."
"Abelard, no matter what happened, you were always at my side."
"Abelard, no matter what happened, you were always at my side."
"Abelard, no matter what happened, you were always at my side."

languages.text: “阿贝拉德，无论发生了什么事情，你始终都在我身边。”
languages.original_text: "Abelard, no matter what happened, you were always at my side."

traits.locale_text: “阿贝拉德，无论发生了什么事情，你始终都在我身边。”

languages.text: «Abelard, ha estado a mi lado en todo momento, sin importar las circunstancias».
languages.original_text: "Abelard, no matter what happened, you were always at my side."

traits.locale_text: «Abelard, ha estado a mi lado en todo momento, sin importar las circunstancias».

languages.text: 「アベラルド、何があろうとも、お前はいつも私の味方をしてくれた」
languages.original_text: "Abelard, no matter what happened, you were always at my side."

traits.locale_text: 「アベラルド、何があろうとも、お前はいつも私の味方をしてくれた」

languages.text: "Abelard, was auch geschehen ist, Ihr wart immer an meiner Seite."
languages.original_text: "Abelard, no matter what happened, you were always at my side."

traits.locale_text: "Abelard, was auch geschehen ist, Ihr wart immer an meiner Seite."

languages.text: « Abélard, vous avez toujours été présent à mes côtés, envers et contre tout. »
languages.original_text: "Abelard, no matter what happened, you were always at my side."

traits.locale_text: « Abélard, vous avez toujours été présent à mes côtés, envers et contre tout. »

languages.text: "Abelard, her ne olursa olsun her daim yanımdaydın."
languages.original_text: "Abelard, no matter what happened, you were always at my side."
